name: Pngdex
tagline: pngDEX is utility which is supposed to Encode your data and place it in a PNG file, you can also Recover your Data using this very same Utility
body:
pngDEX
======

pngDEX is utility which is supposed to Encode your data and place it in a PNG file, you can also Recover your Data using this very same Utility

Author : ludkiller
Last updated : 11/21/2013 13:40 

Do visit my blog if you like my work ;) [**Future Traxex**](http://futuretraxex.wordpress.com)
